title: WTB T206 Common PSA 7 or SGC 84
author: Archive

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Common PSA 7 or SGC 84
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jim
Started the set last fall - mostly nicer raw cards and some graded 4's and 5's.  I thought it might be nice to include one NM card as a sort of reference point.  Everyone seems to try to get one of each back - I might try for one of each grade instead.

Looking for a common PSA 7 or SGC 84 that someone might be interested in selling at a reasonable price. Only interested in one that is representative of the grade and not a misgrade.  A portrait would also be better than some of the more cartoonish poses (Spike, Kisinger, etc.) - one where the registration and color really show well.

As a benchmark, there are currently two commons available BIN in the $550 range. 

email is jlynch@capspart.com

If not, thanks for looking.
